Docs.param: Indicates if the private key can be exported.
The type of key pair to be used for the certificate. Possible values include: 'EC', 'EC-HSM', 'RSA', 'RSA-HSM', 'oct'
The key size in bits. For example: 2048, 3072, or 4096 for RSA.
Indicates if the same key pair will be used on certificate renewal.
Elliptic curve name. For valid values, see Microsoft.Azure.KeyVault.WebKey.JsonWebKeyCurveName. Possible values include: 'P-256', 'P-384', 'P-521', 'P-256K'
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the KeyProperties class.
